author: kristwaa
msg: Fixed bug in LoopingAlphabetStream.read(), where the return value was not and-ed with 0xff.

author: hoffmann
msg: added a conditional, to prevent the wrong setting of the port, which is not checked by TemplateURI.
In my Eyes this is seems like a possible bug within TemplateURI, which checks, whete use.ssl is true, but blindly
sets the port no matter what.

author: rjung
msg: Always build thread safe against Apache httpd 2.0/2.2
_REENTRANT flag for APR is not a safe threading detection

author: jliu
msg: Test case for CXF-693. PortInfo.getBindingID() does work properly, if it is not working in some cases, please provide a test case.
